content:
In the morning, a man was injured in Beryslav explosives.

About thisinformsKherson Ova.

“In the morning, Russian troops attack Berislav's drones. At about eight in the morning, a 45-year-old man was injured as a result of dropping explosives from the drone, ”the message reads.

The department also noted that he had an explosive injury, an injury to the arm and a leg. The victim was provided with medical care.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of hostile attacks in Kherson regionDiedMan, 8 more are injured.
title: Since the morning, Russia attacks Berislav by drums: there is a victim
description: The Kherson Ova informs about it. “In the morning, Russian troops attack drones ...
author: Army Inform
